title: Angelina Jolie visits Fuerteventura discount store with children
text:
She's currently on the Spanish island of Fuerteventura, where she has just started shooting Marvel's latest saga, The Eternals.

And Angelina Jolie seemed to be lapping up the sunshine as she stepped out for a spot of shopping with three of her six children on Tuesday.

The film star, 44, looked in high spirits as she took Zahara, 14, and twins Knox and Vivienne, 11 to a discount store for a perusal.

High spirits: Angelina Jolie seemed to be lapping up the Spanish sunshine as she stepped out for a spot of shopping with three of her six children on Tuesday

The Maleficent: Mistress Of Evil star wore a flowing white sun dress for the outing, teamed with tan sandals.

Tying her brunette locks back from her features, she beamed as she and her children spent the afternoon together.

She shielded her eyes from the Spanish sunshine with large dark shades.

The natural beauty showcased her radiant complexion, keeping her make-up to a minimum.

New project: She's currently on the Spanish island of Fuerteventura, where she has just started shooting Marvel's latest saga, The Eternals

Out with mum: The film star, 44, looked in high spirits as she took Zahara, 14, and twins Knox and Vivienne, 11 to a discount store for a perusal

The Maleficent: Mistress Of Evil star wore a flowing white sun dress for the outing, teamed with tan sandals

Three out of six: Angelina's other three children were not present for the outing

Angelina is playing superhero Thena in the new Marvel movie Eternals, due for release in November 2020.

Production is underway in the Dunes of Corralejo, with tents and trailers set up in the stunning Natural Park desert, which boasts 48,000 hectres of land.

The actress is set to join Salma Hayek, Richard Madden, Kumail Nanjiani, Scarlett Johansson and Don Lee in the big budget movie.

At the panel dedicated to Marvel during San Diego Comic Con, Angelina said: 'I’m so excited to be here! I think what it means to be a part of the MCU, what it means to be an Eternal, what it means to be in this family.

Casual chic: Tying her brunette locks back from her features, she beamed as she and her children spent the afternoon together

Bright: She shielded her eyes from the Spanish sunshine with large dark shades

All smiles: The natural beauty showcased her radiant complexion, keeping her make-up to a minimum

Casual: Vivienne rocked a navy NASA Tee and jeans

Into the sun: The children squinted in the bright light of the afternoon as they left the store

Stretch: Knox reached out in a stretch - and demonstrated that he's fast catching up to his mum in height

Leading the way: Zahara wore an all-black ensemble, with white trainers to complete the look

Checking out: Angelina is playing superhero Thena in the new Marvel movie Eternals, due for release in November 2020

Shop til you drop: The actress is set to join Salma Hayek, Richard Madden, Kumail Nanjiani, Scarlett Johansson and Don Lee in the big budget movie

'We’ve all read the script and we know what the task is and so we are going to work very, very hard.'

Fellow cast-member Scarlett is set to reprise her role as Natasha Romanoff, aka Black Widow, for a spin-off prequel film after her character met her untimely end in Avengers: Endgame.

She previously gushed that it's 'very exciting' to have Angelina in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU).

Angelina's outing comes as the Maleficent sequel has overtaken Joker for the weekend box-office crown in North America.
description: Angelina Jolie seemed to be lapping up the sunshine as she stepped out for a spot of shopping with three of her six children on Tuesday.
